adrFormatAddress: 241 East 86th Street Suites 2A, 2B, and 2C, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: Advantage Testing has an extraordinary tutor named I-fan. To our surprise, our son decided he wanted to re-take the ACT a month or so before the test. He had taken the ACT several times a year prior and had a great super score. We had heard that a tutor can help only so much and our son used another excellent tutor in his earlier test. Needless to say we were quite curious whether more tutoring could bring the score up. I-fan established a routine that our son stuck to like a robot. The routine included details on when to take the practice test, how to organize the facts that need to be memorized, what calculator to use, and even what drinks and snacks to have before and during the test. I-fan was flexible on scheduling sessions, including nights and weekends. All of this motivated our son and got him to believe that hard work would yield the result he was looking for. And it did. Our son is thrilled with his score and, to his delight, no longer needs to rely on a super score. We could not be more grateful to I-fan for his commitment to our son and his excellent and motivating approach to tutoring.

originalText.text:
I would like to personally thank Kathy and her team, Hector and Drew for helping my daughter Amanda, pass the Bar.  She not only passed, but her test scores were also high enough to qualify to practice in UBE Jurisdictions.
Hector thank you so much for helping Amanda on bar week.  Even though you had Covid you came through and found the strength to help Amanda.  Very grateful!  Drew thank you for the years of guiding Amanda and having patience with her.
To any parent considering Advantage Testing, I would say It was the best investment we made in our daughters future.

originalText.text: Couldn't be more complementary of Advantage Testing.  My daughter was tutored by Danny Katch who was AMAZING.  She had a blast with him and all the while, he was teaching her, motivating her, encouraging her, and helping her manage her test anxiety.  She nailed her SATs and I give Danny a lot of credit.  Highly recommend Advantage and especially Danny.

Highly recommend Advantage and especially Danny.

originalText.text: Matt Demmer was terrific with my son's college applications.  Organized,researched,helped him with his essay. He'll be working with us again for sure!

originalText.text:
As a parent sending my two children to Advantage Testing was the best decision I could have ever made amid the college application craziness! I suggest Charles Loxton who is an incredible teacher and continues to support, encourage and teach valuable lessons about how to learn with my daughter.  Charlie is the smartest person I know, and my daughter wouldn’t be where she is without him.  Both of my kids were and still are in good hands.  I recommend Charlie.  Hands-down, and guaranteed he will bring your child to where she/he needs to be.
Thank you!
